Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas scored the second-half opener for Greece
Petros Mantalas scored a late goal to secure Greece's victory
Post-Match Reflections: The win was an emotional one for Greece, following the death of their former teammate George Baldock
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in a packed Karaiskakis Stadium
Others: Ireland's Caoimhin Kelleher made four important saves in the first half
